Class Card

java.lang.Object
parade.models.cards.Card
public class Card extends Object
Represents a single card in the game, characterized by its color, value, and visibility (face-up or face-down). Provides methods to generate styled string representations for rendering in the terminal.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    ANSI_RESET
    ANSI reset code to clear color formatting.

      color - the color of the card

    • getIsFaceUp

      public boolean getIsFaceUp()
      Returns whether the card is face up (visible).
      Returns:
      true if the card is face up, false otherwise

    • setIsFaceUp

      public void setIsFaceUp(boolean isFaceUp)
      Sets whether the card is face up.
      Parameters:
      isFaceUp - true to show the card, false to hide it

    • getAnsiColorCode

      public String getAnsiColorCode()
      Gets the ANSI color code for rendering this card's color.
      Returns:
      ANSI escape sequence representing the card's color

      Returns:
